The movie stars Julian Morris, Margo Harshman, Margo Harshman, Matt O'Leary, Rumer Willis, Rumer Willis, Carrie Fisher.
  * "Rocky" (1976): This classic movie follows the life of Rocky Balboa who dreams of becoming a world-class boxer. After a series of setbacks and failures, Rocky finally gets his chance at the Olympic Games where he faces off against the best boxers in the world. With his heart on the line, Rocky must summon all of his strength, skill, determination, and courage to face off against his toughest opponents and defeat them with his own fists.
